heading: Authentication & identity
paragraph: Tried, tested, and reviewed by the community

productCards.title: Supabase — The open source Firebase alternative
productCards.description: Supabase is an open-source backend-as-a-service that provides real-time databases, authentication, and API services. It enables developers to build and scale applications quickly without managing server infrastructure.

productCards.title: Firebase — An app development platform backed by Google
productCards.description: An app development platform that helps you build and grow apps and games users love. Backed by Google and trusted by millions of businesses around the world.

productCards.title: Appwrite — 100% open source alternative for Firebase
productCards.description: A secure open-source backend server provides the core APIs required to build web and mobile applications. Appwrite provides authentication, database, storage, functions, messaging, and advanced realtime capabilities.

productCards.title: Clerk — An authentication and user management platform
productCards.description: A complete suite of embeddable UIs, flexible APIs, and admin dashboards to authenticate and manage your users.

productCards.title: Plaid — The safer way for your users to link financial accounts
productCards.description: The tools developers need to create easy and accessible experiences for their users. With just a few lines of code, users can connect to more than 12,000 financial institutions.

productCards.title: Memberstack — Authentication & Payments for Webflow. Total design freedom.
productCards.description: Memberstack empowers you to build anything - from gated blogs, to social media platforms - all using Memberstack & Webflow (or, whatever else you use to build sites & apps). Over 3,000 companies like Slack, Reddit, and American Airlines use Memberstack to build scalable, custom membership experiences. You can build everything you need without coding - but, you can also incorporate your own code into your projects and scale with Memberstack to a full-blown react application.

productCards.title: Persona — Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0
productCards.description: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.

productCards.title: WorkOS — Your app, Enterprise Ready
productCards.description: WorkOS provides APIs to make your app Enterprise Ready, with pre-built features and integrations required by IT admins. Start selling to enterprise customers with just a few lines of code. Add Single Sign-On (SSO), Directory Sync, Audit Logs and more to your app today.

productCards.title: Stytch — User infrastructure for modern applications
productCards.description: Stytch is a full stack authentication and authorization platform, whose APIs make it simple to seamlessly onboard, authenticate and engage users. Improve security and user experience by going passwordless.

productCards.title: ApparenceKit — Ship your mobile app in days, not months
productCards.description: ApparenceKit is a complete flutter boilerplate to help you ship a successful app on Android and iOS. Subscription, Notififications, Auth, Ads, translations, Architecture, Deployment....
